body:
Post a riddle then post the answer. The next guy to comment rates that riddle from 1/10. Ex:

Bob: A hobo picks up cigarette butts from the ground and can make a cigarette with 4 butts. If he finds 16 cigarette butts, how many cigarettes can he make?


Answer: 5. He makes 4 cigarettes with the 16 butts. Then he smokes them and has 4 more butts to make another cigarette.

Steve: 3/10

        (Riddle)


And so on!

GO!!!

Ill start.

Youre in a house and ur trapped. There is only a mirror and a table. How do u escape?


Answer: You look in the mirror and see what you saw. Take the saw and cut in half. Two halves equals a hole. You jump through the hole and youre out.


Rate it!

title: [Forums Game] Riddlez

replies.body:
1/10. I have heard it like15 times and it defies Quantum Mechanics. 

If BOSS_Turtle shoots rainbows at a unicorn PeachyYas, how much swag does killerbye have when he takes his shirt off?
